poem:
Title: "The Jester's Allegiance"

In the court of jesters, the king dances,
With twisted praise sung, suspicion advances.
"Genius, savvy" - words spun in the dark,
Murmuring fear, lighting a spark.
Across a cold sea, the bear waits,
Gorged on promise of unfolding fates.
In the theatre of vanity, truth frays,
As dreams are gambled, Democracy pays.
